sentences.sentence: They wind up with the same self-styled grandiosity; they've just found a more interesting way to get to the same point.
sentences.translation: Coldplay仍旧沿袭了自成风格的“宏伟”效果，只不过他们找到了可以达到这一效果的另一条更加有趣的途径。

sentences.sentence: And to what adolescent striving to define an identity do inflated self-esteem and grandiosity not appear attractive?
sentences.translation: 而对努力定义一种身份的青少年确实会膨胀自尊与夸张的事情好像没有吸引力？
